author: Dick Bradsell
description: This powerful, straw yellow cocktail offers a myriad of flavours. Benefitting from the dilution of a long stir and/or the addition of a dash of water.
name: Golden Retriever
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
